metadata.title: CVE-2018-10242 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Suricata version 4.0.4 incorrectly handles the parsing of the SSH banner. Amalformed SSH banner can cause the parsing code to read beyond theallocated data because SSHParseBanner in app-layer-ssh.c lacks a lengthcheck.

criterions.comment: suricata: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
